title: Daily Flash 2012: 366 Days of Flash Fiction
description: DAILY FLASH 2012: 366 DAYS OF FLASH FICTION (LEAP YEAR EDITION) is a 2012 flash fiction calendar anthology, with a 500 word or less short story featured for every day of the calendar year. Filled with 366 short stories, this is a fun and practical anthology designed for busy readers.
author: Neil Leckman
